ğŸŒ… Tomorrow we meet at the Framer x Warsaw Meetup! Prepare for a day filled with learning, networking, and innovation. We will dive deep into the no-code world and reveal all of Framer's secrets. See you there! #EventTomorrow #FramerMeetup PS: If you haven't reserved a spot for yourself, you can still do it by clicking the link under the post.

ğŸŒ How Framer is Changing the Game for Web Designers In the rapidly evolving digital landscape, staying ahead means embracing innovative tools that not only streamline our workflows but also enhance our creative potential. That's where Framer comes into play, revolutionizing and supercharging the way we approach web design and development at WAYF. Gone are the days when the realms of design and development were siloed, creating bottlenecks and inefficiencies. After Webflow, Framer has been a true game-changer for our growing team of designers and no-code developers, blurring the lines between design and implementation. This expansion of capability means weâ€™re faster and more cost-effective for our clients. By cutting down on the resources typically required for separate design and development phases, we can offer more competitive pricing without compromising on quality. Want to hear more about our perspective on how no-code / low-code empowers innovation? Make sure to join the Framer x Warsaw meetup weâ€™re hosting on the 21st of March and letâ€™s have a chat! You can register here:

At WAYF, we believe in the power of connections to fuel our journey forward. ğŸŒŸ This January, we embraced this spirit as most of our team members gathered for a week-long offsite at a medieval mansion in Kliczkow Maly in central Poland. We're hiring across Development (Mid/Senior/Lead Fullstack), Project Management, No-code, and more! Link in the first comment.

Explore the transformative power of AI in design with WAYF! We're at the forefront of blending innovative technology with creative prowess, revolutionizing how design solutions are crafted. Our approach seamlessly integrates AI to enhance aesthetics, functionality, and user engagement. This tech-enabled strategy not only accelerates workflows but also ensures our designs are smart, adaptive, and aligned with the latest market trends. Here's how we're leading the charge in AI-driven design solutions: ğŸš€Creative AI Copywriting: Relume AI & Chat GPT streamline UX writing and ideation. ğŸ–¼ï¸Advanced AI Image Editing: Treat, PhotoRoom, Figma plugins, Image Tracer, and Flair AI for top-tier image editing and photography. ğŸŒEfficient AI Design & Prototyping: Rapid website creation with Framer Webflow & Relume AI, Octopus.do, and others. ğŸ¨AI-Assisted Color & Image Quality: Harmonious color palettes with Coolors, and image optimization using Figma plugins. ğŸ“ŠAI-Powered UX Analysis & Market Research: Enhancing user engagement and ensuring market-aligned designs. ğŸŒAutomated Accessibility Testing: Guaranteeing inclusive and compliant designs. Elevate your business with WAYF's AI-enabled design expertise. Book your free discovery session now!

As the AI market evolves, we integrate cutting-edge AI tools into our development processes at WAYF. Our integration of AI is not just altering our workflow; it's really changing the way we create and deliver software. ğŸŒŸ Here's a glimpse into how our Software Engineers leverage AI for maximised impact: 1. Enhanced coding efficiency with autocompletion tools ğŸ–¥ï¸âœ¨: Our software engineers leverage tools like GitHub Copilot to significantly speed up code creation. By automating routine coding tasks, we free up time to focus on creative and complex problem-solving, ensuring your projects benefit from both efficiency and innovation. 2. AI-powered code and data generation ğŸš€ğŸ“Š: From generating diverse data sets to crafting intricate SQL queries, we harness the power of AI, including ChatGPT, for various tasks.
